verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song. We give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God; We give <S%H3034>thanks<s%>, for thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>: Men <S%H5608>tell<s%> of thy wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
When I shall <S%H3947>find<s%> the <S%H4150>set<s%> <S%H8199>time<s%>, I will judge <S%H4339>uprightly<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof are <S%H4127>dissolved<s%>: I have set <S%H8505>up<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H5542>it<s%>. [[Selah
I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1984>arrogant<s%>, Deal not <S%H1984>arrogantly<s%>; And to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Lift not <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%>:
Lift not <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>; <S%H1696>Speak<s%> not with a <S%H6277>stiff<s%> <S%H6677>neck<s%>.
For neither from the <S%H4161>east<s%>, nor from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, Nor yet from the <S%H4057>south<s%>, cometh lifting <S%H7311>up<s%>.
But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8199>judge<s%>: He putteth <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>one<s%>, and lifteth up another.

For in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> there is a <S%H3563>cup<s%>, and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H2560>foameth<s%>; It is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4538>mixture<s%>, and he poureth <S%H5064>out<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%>: Surely the <S%H8105>dregs<s%> <S%H7563>thereof<s%>, all the wicked of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H4680>drain<s%> <S%H8354>them<s%>, and drink them.
But I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
All the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> also will I cut <S%H1438>off<s%>; But the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%>.
